text: aur jinhen tum khuda ka shareek bataate ho mai un se kyon darun jab tum is baat se nahin darate ki tumane khuda ka shareek aisee cheezon ko banaaya hai jinakee khuda ne koee sanad tum par nahin naazil kee phir agar tum jaanate ho to (bhala batao to sahee ki) ham donon phareeq (giroh) mein aman qaayam rakhane ka jyaada haqadaar kaun hai
